assistant:
[THINKING]
Several of these scripts are server-specific:- configure_postgres_tailscale.sh - server config
- setup_250_failover.sh - failover server config- setup_local_librarian.py - local librarian setup- setup_local_postgres.sql - postgres setup- start_wolf_stack.sh - starts the wolf stack
- sync_from_181.py - syncs from server 181- sync_ollama_models.sh - syncs ollama models

These should go to server-configuration/. The others (fido2-alert.sh, speechnote-mic-toggle.py, termux_setup.sh) are more client-side.
